Function reference

All functions

add_entry()
Add entry to lexicon
create_lexadb()
Create a new Lexa database
import_lexicon_csv()
Import lexicon from a csv file
include_gloss()
Include gloss in Rmd
lexa_html()
Lexa HTML document
lexa_pdf()
Lexa PDF document
load_lexadb()
Load Lexa database
print(<lexadb>)
Print method for Lexa databases
print(<lexalx>)
Print method for lexemes
print(<lexalxs>)
Print method for list of entries
print(<lexast>)
Print method for sentences
print(<lexatx>)
Print method for texts
search_lexicon()
Search lexicon entries
search_texts()
Search words in texts
show_entry()
Show lexicon entry with given id
show_text()
Show text or sentence with given id
typeset_gloss()
Typeset interlinear gloss
